mention.base module¶

class mention.base.AppDataAPI(access_token)[source]¶

Bases: mention.base.Mention

query()[source]¶

The request that returns a JSON file of the API call given a url. :return: the base_url and the end_url :rtype: :class: json

url¶

The concatenation of the base_url and end_url that make up the resultant url. :return: the base_url and the end_url :rtype: str

class mention.base.Mention(access_token)[source]¶

Bases: object

The base class for all of the Mention API calls.

Parameters:access_token – Mention API access_token
params()[source]¶

Parameters used in the url of the API call.

query()[source]¶

The request that returns a JSON file of the API call given a url.

url()[source]¶

The concatenation of the base_url and parameters that make up the resultant url.

Module contents¶

Mention-Python is a library that provides a pure Python interface for the Mention API.
